content: shalom is a simple knitted cardigan with a striking appearance this triple-yoked sweater is seamlessly knit top down with a single button closure the cap sleeves bow out slightly from the body to create a more dramatic shape if you need help interpreting the pattern choosing yarn or making modifications please stop by shalom tips 1 1 shalom tips 2 2 shalom tips 3 3 the shalom cardigan pattern is currently available in english spanish french portuguese polish and german see links in right sidebar of linked blog 1 http //involvingthesenses blogspot com/2008/03/shalom-tips-1 html 2 http //involvingthesenses blogspot com/2008/04/shalom-tips-2 html 3 http //involvingthesenses blogspot com/2008/04/shalom-tips-3 html
